metadata.title: CVE-2022-3115 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16-rc6.malidp_crtc_reset in drivers/gpu/drm/arm/malidp_crtc.c lacks check of thereturn value of kzalloc() and will cause the null pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
